title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 2102 - Adjustments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 2102 - Adjustments

State Regulations
§ 2102.1 - Maximum rents
§ 2102.2 - Effective date of orders adjusting rents
§ 2102.3 - Grounds for increase of maximum rent
§ 2102.4 - Grounds for decrease of maximum rent
§ 2102.5 - Decrease of services: application, order or report
§ 2102.6 - Orders where the maximum rent or other facts are in dispute, in doubt, or not known, or where maximum rent must be fixed
§ 2102.7 - Order where an apartment is rented to more than one tenant
§ 2102.8 - Rent adjustments upon succession
§ 2102.9 - Surcharge for the installation and use of washing machines, dryers and dishwashers
§ 2102.10 - Surcharges for submetered electricity or other utility service
§ 2102.11 - Schedule

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 2102

Statutory authority: Emergency Housing Rent Control Law, L. 1946, ch. 274[4] [a], as amd.; L. 1964, ch. 244; L. 1950, ch. 250, as
amd. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
